message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity! This product is a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, a steal considering its potential. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I trust your judgment, Alice. Let's make this deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the first product! As for this next one, I have to warn you, it's a bit of a risk. I've had some... mixed results with this particular item. But I truly believe it has potential! I'm still willing to let it go for $1000000, and I think you'll be surprised by its unique features. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on it?
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but given the outcome of the last product, I think it's best to err on the side of caution. Perhaps we can explore other opportunities in the future.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. But I assure you, this next product is a game-changer! I've had the pleasure of working with this item myself, and I can confidently say it's one of the best I've ever seen. The quality is exceptional, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before - $1000000. I'm willing to make it worth your while, though. I'll throw in a personalized guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll work with you to find a solution. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance on this incredible opportunity?
Your confidence in this product is compelling, Alice. Given the personalized guarantee, I'm willing to take the chance. Let's see what this product has to offer!

I'm thrilled you're excited about the previous product, Bob! And I'm happy to report that this next one is just as impressive. In fact, I think you'll find it's even more exceptional than the last. I'm still willing to let it go for $1000000, and I'll throw in the same personalized guarantee as before. But I'll also offer you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you a priority spot on my next exclusive offering, which I think you'll find even more impressive. What do you say? Are you ready to take your experience to the next level?

Your enthusiasm for this product is contagious, Alice. With the personalized guarantee and the special deal, I'm definitely interested in taking my experience to the next level. Let's make this happen!
